ing: 1/2 fresh pineapple - peeled, cored, and cut into chunks
des: "A frosty, refreshing pineapple drink. If necessary, sweeten to taste with honey or sugar."
ins: In a blender, combine pineapple chunks, pineapple juice and coconut extract. Puree until smooth. Then, with the blender running, drop ice cubes one at a time into the opening in the lid of the blender. Make sure each cube is crushed before adding the next. Blend to desired texture. Serve in tall glasses.
